column3: News;Phnom Penh:------  Police rraided a condo room on September 27
column10: Khan Chamkar Morn.------ A Chinese man named  YANG THING HAI
column12: was arrested. He does not live at the location and does not have a passport.------When the force of police and ministries arrived at the  building
column13: they went up to the 11th floor and checked  room 1113-1114 but did not see the suspect. So the force continued to open other rooms. A check of 1115 found and detained the suspect.------*Why the cops were hunting him is unclear------https://tvfb.news/article/14708
